metadata.dc:author: Vázquez Nava, F
Govea Gómez, C
metadata.dc:description: There is a need to know the epidemiology behavior of health problem, with the purpose of creating the supporting basis for all action to its concern. In the cities Tampico, Madero and Altamira, a systematic exploration of the prevalent situation of allergic disorders did not exist: now, there is a study of 730 people selected at random, by means of questionnaire including 55 items applied to the population as a whole that live in the different zones of this area. It has been found that 54% show an allergic illness, it must be observed that in 66% of them a familial allergic history existed, whereas 45% has seasoning crisis environmental-related.
metadata.dc:title: Epidemiología de las enfermedades alérgicas en la zona conurbada Tampico-Ciudad Madero-Altamira.
[Epidemiology of allergic diseases in the Tampico-Ciudad Madero- Altamira metropolitan area].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista alergia : organo oficial de la Sociedad Mexicana de Alergia e Inmunlogia
